 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָעַר‎</span>] **verb** ==growl== (Late Hebrew ***id. cry, bray***; compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***make a noise*** [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>2815</sup>; possibly Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***na'ru***</u></abbr>, ***cry***, ***roar*** (?) [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 439</sup>); — only **Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽעֲרוּ כְּגוֺרֵי אֲרָיוֺת‎</span> [[Jer.51.38|Jer 51:38]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּכְּפִרִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁאָ֑גוּ‎</span>).
